response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. My proposal is to offer this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,200,000. I am confident that this offer represents a fair and advantageous deal for both parties. Should you decide to proceed, I am here to facilitate the transaction smoothly. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
